sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { Stepper, Step, Button } from "@material-tailwind/react"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; export default function Donate() { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const [activeStep, setActiveStep] = useState(0); const [isLastStep, setIsLastStep] = useState(false); const [isFirstStep, setIsFirstStep] = useState(false); const [nextClicks, setNextClicks] = useState(0); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullname: "", studentNumber: "", email: "", }); const handleNext = () => { if (activeStep < 2 && nextClicks < 2) { setActiveStep((cur) => cur + 1); setNextClicks((count) => count + 1); } else { // Handle maximum number of next clicks reached console.log("Maximum number of next clicks reached"); } }; const handlePrev = () => { setActiveStep((cur) => cur - 1); setNextClicks(0); }; React.useEffect(() => { setIsFirstStep(activeStep === 0); setIsLastStep(activeStep === 2); }, [activeStep]); const [selectedAmount, setSelectedAmount] = useState(0); const handleAmountSelect = (amount) => { setSelectedAmount(amount); }; const renderStepContent = (step) => { switch (step) { case 0: return (

Select a Donation Amount

{t("Donate.optional")}

{filteredOptions.map((option) => (
); case 1: return (
setFormData({ ...formData, fullname: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, studentNumber: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, email: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, tentativeDate: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, tentativeTime: e.target.value }) } />
); case 2: return (

Payment

Pay With:

Donation Summary

Date

$25.00

Rick

Qty: 1

Total

$25.00

); default: return null; } }; return (
setIsLastStep(value)} isFirstStep={(value) => setIsFirstStep(value)} > setActiveStep(0)} />
setActiveStep(1)} />
setActiveStep(2)} />
{renderStepContent(activeStep)}
); }
